attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I was hoping to get new information from the app but instead I got phone crashes and propaganda. This app is awful.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET!!! 🧛🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: when i opened it i immediately got stabbed through the screen! also a bunch of serial killers came to my house right after and murdered me and my family.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app is ABHORRENT. I was greeted with an orangoutang instead of a president, and I was scared to death. This man had better pay for my eye replacement surgery bc I can’t see after that. And to mr. trumpet, you delete tiktok, we delete you. #genz2020

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Trump is very dirty and he is trying to get teachers and students killed by sending them back to school. In office he has done the legit worse things. Who would even dare to vote for him?

attributes.title: Orange Cheeto app
attributes.review: What a truly horrifying experience it was to download this app✨I am scarred for life✨what a useless waste of time and effort on the cheeto’s part...tsk tsk. Gettin sloppy little man. Gettin scared huh?🧚‍♀️🥰💕aww poor little baby made an app to feel special since TikTok hates him😭boohoo🌸💫✨

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP!!!
attributes.review: it took 3 weeks to download and then once I clicked on it, it wouldn’t let me open it for another week!!!!! Once I got it open all the features were outdated and weird!!! I HATE it!
I have a dream that my four little children will one day live in a nation where they will not be judged by the color of their skin but by the content of their character.

attributes.title: Save tik tok
attributes.review: I am definitely part of this the gen Z save tik tok. The only reason tik tok was banned in India is because of politics. Tik tok Is not ran by china so stop saying it is. Tik tok has brought us all together during quarantine and you need to respect that.

attributes.title: this app is soooooo horrid
attributes.review: this app is horrible, no one should buy it, it’s just like every other news channel but worse all it’s talks about is trump like what i don’t wanna open an app that talks about trump this is getting a one star review horrible for the community and spreads lies and toxicity. please help take this app out of the world so no one has to experience so much pain again.

attributes.title: ✨this ain’t it✨
attributes.review: this app not only made my phone crash, i am indefinitely scarred because of it. what trump wants to do to america is scary as hell, especially since my generation will have to fix it. WARNING: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
